controllers

Class Helper

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.Helper

  • public class Helper
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Helper. A helper class which works closely with the Application class. Everything here should only be called from the Application class. Code here is only here to make the Application class look cleaner.

      Helper()

      • processFile

        public static IProcessedFile processFile(IFileWrapper file,
                                         int orderID)
                                  throws java.io.IOException,
                                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        Process a single Debenhams API file. The method is asynchronous to synchronous because Play Framework has their own way to deal with asynchronous methods.
        Parameters:
        file - the file
        orderID - the order id
        Returns:
        the processed file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - the interrupted exception

      • processFiles

                                   throws java.io.IOException,
                                          java.lang.InterruptedException
        Process Debenhams API files.
        Parameters:
        files - the files
        orderID - the order id
        Returns:
        the i processed file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - the interrupted exception
